hq.minError: you need at least one HQ unit
hq.maxError: you can't have more then two HQ units

troops.minError: you have to take at least two troops choise
troops.maxError: you can't have more then six troops units

fast.maxError: you can't have more then three fast units

elite.maxError: you can't have more then three elite units

heavy.maxError: you can't have more then three heavy units

fort.maxError: you can't have more then three heavy units
